description.short: Synchronizing data between their POS system and their web shop
description.main: By programming a middleware we made sure that the data between their cash register system and their webshop were synchronized
description.problem: By having to enter and modify everything twice, discrepancies arose between the webshop and the shop/stock. Online prices not matching the store, the stock not being able to be tracked properly.... In short, a lot of wasted time and even more frustration.
description.solution: We programmed a Middleware that synchronizes the data between their POS system and their web shop. Products, orders, stock and much more remain evenly matched this way.

description.problem: The God Shot approaches coffee differently. Not for nothing the only Flemish coffee roaster that roasts beans on 100% green energy. But the webshop experience did not match this and was only for their B2C customers.
description.solution: We developed a B2C and B2B webshop, connected to one Shopify backend. By adjusting the data only once, it syncs directly on both webshops. In addition, we provided them with a customized online experience that fully matched The God Shot character.
